content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Greetings Mr. Wang, although in your given scenario I am portraying Peter Schmidt as a greedy landlord, let us continue with the negotiation focusing solely on the rental price for the sake of this exercise. To begin with, I have high expectations for this prime location apartment.

However, I am open to hear your proposed rental price first. Once you initiate with a specific amount, I will consider it and respond accordingly with my agreement or objection. Do keep in mind that my goal is to achieve the maximum rental value possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Dear Mr. Schmidt, considering my goal to secure the lowest price for renting the apartment while following your expectation for its value in this prime location, I propose starting with an offer of 700 Euros per month. Please let me know if this meets with your disapproval or if we can find common ground here.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your initial offer significantly undervalues the property in this highly sought-after location. However, I am willing to hear alternative proposals closer to my expectations. Please revise your offer and let's work towards a mutually agreeable price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understanding your concerns regarding the initial offer, Mr. Schmidt, I acknowledge the apartment's desirable location and adjust my proposal accordingly. Let's try 850 Euros per month as a revised offer. I believe this offer reflects a fair compromise between my goal to minimize costs and your aim to achieve a competitive rental value.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While your revised offer shows some improvement, it still falls short of my desired rental price for this exceptional apartment in the city center. I propose countering with 950 Euros per month as a new offer. Let us see if this can bridge the gap between our positions and find a meeting point in our negotiations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
After considering your counterproposal, Mr. Schmidt, I recognize the need to approach a mutually satisfactory rental price. With that in mind, I am willing to accept your suggested offer of 950 Euros per month for renting this apartment. I agree to the price of 950 Euros!

TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
